parties.raw_snippet: NATIONAL FOOTBALL MUSEUM, INC., an Ohio non-profit corporation, doing business as Pro Football Hall of Fame (“PFHOF”), HOF Village Media Group, LLC (the “Village Media Company”), a Delaware limited liability company that is a wholly-owned subsidiary of HOF Village, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“HOFV”) and, solely for purposes of Section 4.5, HOFV
parties.reasoning: The introductory paragraph explicitly names and defines the entities entering into the agreement, including their legal structures and short-form names used throughout the document.

contract_type.raw_snippet:
MEDIA LICENSE AGREEMENT
THIS MEDIA LICENSE AGREEMENT (this “Agreement”) is made and effective as of the date of the Closing (as defined in the Merger Agreement
(as defined below)) (the “Effective Date”), between NATIONAL FOOTBALL MUSEUM, INC., an Ohio non-profit corporation, doing business as
Pro Football Hall of Fame (“PFHOF”), HOF Village Media Group, LLC (the “Village Media Company”), a Delaware limited liability company that is
a wholly-owned subsidiary of HOF Village, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“HOFV”) and, solely for purposes of Section 4.5, HOFV.
...
2.1 Subject to the terms of this Agreement (including, without limitation, Sections 2.3, 2.4, 2.6 and 5 below), PFHOF hereby grants to
the Village Media Company a worldwide, non-exclusive, limited, non-sublicenseable and non-assignable (except to the extent set
forth in this Agreement) right and license to (a) Exploit the PFHOF Works and (b) edit, supplement or otherwise adapt,
incorporate or otherwise utilize, the PFHOF Works to create, produce and Exploit new, original work(s) (each such work in this
clause (b), a “HOFV Work”).
contract_type.reasoning: The title of the agreement clearly states 'MEDIA LICENSE AGREEMENT'. Furthermore, Section 2.1 explicitly states that PFHOF 'hereby grants to the Village Media Company a ... right and license to (a) Exploit the PFHOF Works'. This confirms the primary purpose is the licensing of media.

notice_period.raw_snippet:
Unless otherwise terminated as provided herein, the term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall
terminate on December 31, 2034 (such period, including as may be extended in accordance with the subsequent sentence, the
“Term”). Thereafter, the agreement shall automatically renew for successive five (5)-year terms, unless either Party gives written
notice to the other Party of intent not to renew at least six (6) months prior to the expiration of the then-current Term.
notice_period.reasoning: Section 4.1 specifies that the agreement automatically renews 'unless either Party gives written notice to the other Party of intent not to renew at least six (6) months prior to the expiration of the then-current Term'. This is the notice required to prevent automatic renewal.

expiration_date.raw_snippet:
Unless otherwise terminated as provided herein, the term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall
terminate on December 31, 2034 (such period, including as may be extended in accordance with the subsequent sentence, the
“Term”).
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 4.1 clearly states the initial termination date as 'December 31, 2034'.

renewal_term.raw_snippet:
Thereafter, the agreement shall automatically renew for successive five (5)-year terms, unless either Party gives written
notice to the other Party of intent not to renew at least six (6) months prior to the expiration of the then-current Term.
renewal_term.reasoning: Section 4.1 explicitly states that 'the agreement shall automatically renew for successive five (5)-year terms' after the initial term.
